text: 1 ½ tablespoons olive oil or avocado oil
label: ingredient

text: 3 tablespoons chopped fresh fine herbs like dill, parsley, chives or a combination
label: ingredient

text: Flaky sea salt for serving like Maldon sea salt
label: ingredient

text: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat.
label: step

text: Trim an inch or two from the bottom of the stems (these can be dried out and hard). If any stalks are unusually thick compared to the rest of the bunch, slice them in half lengthwise.
label: step

text: Place the broccolini on the baking sheet and toss with the oil, salt, and pepper. Spread the stems out so that they are not on top of each other.
label: step

text: Roast for about 15 minutes or until the stems are tender and the tips of the florets are beginning to brown and crisp.
label: step

text: Serve with the herbs and a little flaky sea salt scattered on top.
label: step
